name: Axe Beak
description: The Axe Beak is a large, flightless bird with a sharp, axe-shaped beak and thick, coarse feathers. It stands taller than a human and possesses long, powerful legs.
memorable: Its aggressive nature and deadly beak make it a formidable opponent, especially when attacking in groups.
goals: Typically hunts for prey and can serve as a mount for tribes or raiders.
relations: Often found in the company of tribes or raiders who utilize its speed in battle.
environment: Commonly found in plains and savannahs.
strengths: Notable for its high speed and the ability to deliver impactful attacks with its beak.
weaknesses: Low armor class and hit points make it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: Primarily utilizes its beak to deliver slashing damage in melee combat.
most_powerful_ability: Evasive ability allows it to quickly disengage or dodge, enhancing its survivability.
senses: Passive perception score of 10, indicating normal awareness in its environment.
skills: No special skill proficiencies, but has an average Stealth score of 11.
additional_information: Can be aggressive toward unfamiliar creatures.
Acts effectively as a group attacker.
Serves as a reliable mount for faster movement.
Known for its strong legs and swift movements.
Axe Beaks may retreat quickly using their tactical abilities.
